modName: Taken Veterans - Svena the Nord Cold Warrior
summary:
The Nord Cold Warrior is a knight skilled in frost magic.
Start the game at level 30, knowing only a few select spells and skills & without any gold or equipment! Things will not be easy--Skyrim has leveled up too, & this will be a whole new adventure.
descriptionHtml:
Taken Veterans - Balanced Character Builds for Skyrim

Svena the female Nord Cold Warrior
or Svenk, a male Nord Cold Warrior

Svena, \"The Cold Warrior\", is a stunning Nord knight, with high ranks in Heavy Armor, Destruction, and One-Handed. In combat, Svena wears a Frost Cloak and surrounds herself with Walls of Frost to damage and slow any enemy that comes near, using her One-Handed weapon to finish them off. Expert level Restoration magic keeps Svena going in longer battles. 

This Chaotic Good beauty wants only to help solve the world\'s problems. It\'s just that she never met a problem she couldn\'t solve by freezing it solid then clubbing it with a mace! 

Svena has 29 unallocated Perk Points, 230 Magicka, 200 Health, and 160 Stamina

Svena\'s Initial Skill Set:
	Heavy Armor 100
	Speech, Destruction 75
	One Handed, Restoration 60 
	Enchanting, Alteration, Conjuration, Smithing, Block, Archery, Light Armor, Two-Handed, Sneak, Pickpocket, Alchemy, Lockpicking, Illusion 15

1@100           2@75          2@60          13@15
1*(100*101/2) + 2*(75*76/2) + 2*(60*61/2) + 13*(15*16/2)			
= 15,970 [url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Total Experience Spent In Skills[/url]

Svena Starting Spells:
	Magelight, Detect Life, Waterbreathing, Detect Dead, Ebonyflesh
	Frostbite, Frost Rune, Ice Spike, Frost Cloak, Ice Storm, Icy Spear, Wall of Frost, Blizzard
	Close Wounds, Greater Ward, Heal Other, Circle of Protection, Grand Healing, Repel Undead, Turn Greater Undead

Svena\'s Learned Shouts:
	Ice Form (Liz Slen Nus)
	Frost Breath (Fo Krah Diin)
	
Svena\'s Mixed Heritage:
	Highborn (+50 Magicka)
	Highborn (Regen Magicka Daily)
	Prowler\'s Profit (Find More Jewels)
	
Svena\'s Heroic Gear:
	Ebony Mace	000139b0
	Ebony Helmet of Eminent Destruction	000cf87b
	Ebony Armor of Eminent Destruction	0010cf72
	Ebony Gauntlets of Eminent Wielding	000cf866
	Ebony Boots of Eminent Stamina	0010df84
	Nahkriin	00061ca5

\"Veterans\" are pre-built characters, skilled and equipped in tune with the limitations of their experience. The entire game is unexplored, and adapted to your new level--allowing you to try out advanced play-styles and quest-lines avoiding hours of required preliminaries.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------
Installation and Use:
Unzip the saved game in the download to your .../My Games/Skyrim/Saves folder, then load it in Skyrim.
-----------------------------------------------------------------------
3.0 Svena and Svenk get some gear, and reworked skills.
2.0 Streamlined Svena & Svenk. Dropped Block. All cold spells included. 
1.0-1.6 First Ever Veteran. Focused stats, fixed bugs, introduced other bugs...
-----------------------------------------------------------------------

Whenever a character earns a rank, r, in a skill they gain r experience. When a character has 0 in all skills they have zero experience, and when they have 100 in all skills, at level 81.5, they have 90,900 experience. A character normally hits Level 30 at 15,865 Total Experience.

Taken Veterans should look good with any texture or mesh mods you may use, if any. The mods used in the screenshots include:
Face Textures (Female): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=3563]Coverwomen[/url]
Face Textures (Male): [url=http://www.skyrimnexus.com/downloads/file.php?id=26]Detailed Faces[/url]

Look in the discussions area for the batch commands allowing you to make a veteran out of a character you\'ve created yourself!

More Info:
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimExp]Experience Table[/url]
[url=http://bit.ly/SkyrimCharBatch]Tips on making your own veterans[/url]

Drop a Taken Veteran save game in your Saves folder and load it up. See what you think!
author: Taken
